name: study3_cohort_vhir
title: Hospitalized Ambulatory Patients with Primary Diagnosis of Heart Failure
description: This cohort includes patients hospitalized with a primary discharge diagnosis of heart failure for the first time. The primary discharge diagnosis refers to the main clinical condition responsible for the hospital admission.

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entry.name: patientEncounter
entry.description: Captures hospital ambulatory encounters when a patient is admitted for care.

period.description: The earliest hospitalization period where the patient meets the heart failure diagnosis criteria, ensuring only first-time admissions are included in the cohort.
